nodes.text: The spaceport tower of the Jedi Temple was a tower erected in the Temple district on Coruscant.
Located in the Temple district, the mooring tower of the Jedi Temple was established by the Jedi Order to accommodate larger starships landing at the Temple.

In 19 BBY Jedi Master Jai Maruk landed a Seltaya-class courier at the tower having returned gravely injured from an encounter with Asajj Ventress. At the time, Chief Technician Boz Addle oversaw all flights in and out of the Precinct, reporting to Temple Security Forces if anyone landed without Temple's approval.
